MCAN_StdMsgIDFilterElement_t Struct Reference
CANFD Driver » CANFD Driver Internal Data Structures

Data structure defines the MCAN Standard Message ID Filter Element. More...

#include <drivers/canfd/include/canfd_internal.h>

Detailed Description

Data structure defines the MCAN Standard Message ID Filter Element.

Field Documentation

uint32_t MCAN_StdMsgIDFilterElement_t::sfec

Standard Filter Element Configuration 000 - Disable filter element 001 - Store in Rx FIFO 0 if filter matches 010 - Store in Rx FIFO 1 if filter matches 011 - Reject ID if filter matches 100 - Set priority if filter matches 101 - Set priority and store in FIFO 0 if filter matches 110 - Set priority and store in FIFO 1 if filter matches 111 - Store into Rx Buffer or as debug message, configuration of SFT[1:0] ignored. If SFEC - 100b, 101b, or 110b a match sets high priority message event is generated.

uint32_t MCAN_StdMsgIDFilterElement_t::sfid1

Standard Filter ID 1

uint32_t MCAN_StdMsgIDFilterElement_t::sfid2

Standard Filter ID 2

uint32_t MCAN_StdMsgIDFilterElement_t::sft

Standard Filter Type 00 - Range filter from SFID1 to SFID2 (SFID2 >= SFID1) 01 - Dual ID filter for SFID1 or SFID2 10 - Classic filter: SFID1 = filter, SFID2 = mask 11 - Filter element disabled
